result.markdown: --- title: "Linear regression" --- ### Content Recording 2c is optional. ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} |S |Content | Slides | PDF | Videos | SAS | R | |:--|:-------------------------|:-------------------------------------------------------------------------:|:--------------------------------------------------------------------------:|:---------------------------------------------------------------------:|:---------------------------------------------------------------------------:|:---------------------------------------------------------------------------:| |2a |Parameter interpretation |[](https://lbelzile.github.io/MATH60604A-slides/MATH60604A_w2a_param.html)|[](https://lbelzile.github.io/MATH60604A-slides/MATH60604A_w2a_param.pdf)|[](https://youtu.be/4jOnZrnPlUM)|[](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lbelzile/statmod/main/code/MATH60604A_2a_intro.sas)|[](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lbelzile/statmod/main/code/MATH60604A_2a_intro.R)| |2b |Linear transformations |[](https://lbelzile.github.io/MATH60604A-slides/MATH60604A_w2b_lineartransfo.html)|[](https://lbelzile.github.io/MATH60604A-slides/MATH60604A_w2b_lineartransfo.pdf)|[](https://youtu.be/MzmS9r-77lI)|[](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lbelzile/statmod/main/code/MATH60604A_2b_param.sas)|[](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/lbelzile/statmod/main/code/MATH60604A_2b_param.R)| |2c |Geometry of least squares |[](https://lbelzile.github.io/MATH60604A-slides/MATH60604A_w2c_geometry.html)|[](https://lbelzile.github.io/MATH60604A-slides/MATH60604A_w2c_geometry.pdf)|[](https://youtu.be/F9dR6mpOVtI)| | | ::: ::: -
